plot: Jim Marlow and his strange-looking Martian friend Willis were allowed to travel only so far. But one day Willis unwittingly tuned into a treacherous plot that threatened all the colonists on Mars, and it set Jim off on a terrfying adventure that could save--or destroy--them all!From the Paperback edition.
characters: Jim Marlow, Willis the Bouncer, Doc MacRae, Francis "Frank" Sutton, Gekko, Headmaster Howe, Mr. Beecher
